posts.post_title: FS: NEW Lot of 7 Lower Grade T206 w/ Bastian & Conroy (Polar Bear) **PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 cards for sale or trade. These are mostly nicer looking lower grade cards as the scans will show, and most have very nice eye appeal.

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Payment via any method you prefer. Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

CARDS PICTURED:

Bastian (SL) - $55 **SOLD**
Conroy (Polar Bear) - $35 **SOLD**
Hannifan - $18 **SOLD**
Phelan - $18 **SOLD**
Nattress - $18
Ritter - $18 **SOLD**
Schlafly - $18 **SOLD**
Bump for a price drop on the remaining cards.

I'll take:
